title: INAPAM: These Elders Will Be Able To Learn English For Free
text: Written on 7/1/2024 Â· 10:00 am in National. National Institute for the People older adults ,Inapam) is most recognized for the credential that provides them with various discounts, however, this organization is also in charge of other activities such as organizing classes. English And other languages. It is through the cultural centers of Inapam That more than 150 activities are taught to the students older adultsOf which there are four and distributed in different parts of Mexico City. It should be noted that different activities are provided for each of them older adultslike the classes of EnglishFrench, ballroom dancing, embroidery and fabric printing, yoga, Zumba and even guidance on apps, cell phones and tablets. To reach them, older adults They must meet these requirements: - be 60 years or older - official id - Credential of Inapam - Specific Population Registry Code (CURP) - two child sized photos - medical certificate - Registration format in cultural centers Inapam - collection fee Benefits offered by INAPAM to older adults He Inapam It is the body in charge of security older adults, because it is one of the most vulnerable groups in the society. Efforts are made to ensure that the elderly receive better care through a range of support and social programs. One of the programs that stands out among the programs designed for older adults InapamWith this, all senior citizens get access to sales and discounts at various participating establishments. To know them all, you can enter the 2023 Benefits Directory with a credential InapamWhich can be accessed through the official website of the Government of Mexico. JR
